name: Where the Sidescroll Ends
description: Where the Sidescroll Ends is a sidescroller game inspired by Mario and all the sidescrollers that spawned from it. In the game you take the role of Blade Bird, a generic main protagonist with a design that is somewhat stuck in the past. You venture out into a strange and colorful 8-bit world, seeking greater foes to slay with your giant ass sword. Will you find the challenge you were seeking?
